name: AuDHD Kanban & Timer
description: A focus-friendly task manager utilizing floating panels and docks for a flexible workspace.
features: Kanban Board: Drag-and-drop tasks organized in floating panels.
Tomato Timer: Integrated timer with controlled work/break intervals.
Floating Docks UI: Navigation and tools accessible via floating docks and panels to minimize visual clutter.
Quick Add: Rapid task entry to capture thoughts instantly.
